title: Discerning the Intended Order for Reality | Paul Anleitner on @The Meaning Code
description:
This is an extended segment from an even longer conversation I had as a guest on @The Meaning Code.
How might we best understand the intended meaning of Genesis 1 and what theologians often refer to as the "Four Phase Story of the Bible" (Creation, Fall, Redemption, & Consummation/Resurrection)? 

How do we discern the intended order for the cosmos, and what is our part in it all?

You can check out the full conversation on The Meaning Code channel:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jWSeqqpzpFE&ab_channel=TheMeaningCode
